# horizontal(layoutSize:subitem:count:)

**Type Method**

Creates a group of the specified size, containing an array of equally sized items arranged in a horizontal line up to the number specified by count.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func horizontal(layoutSize: NSCollectionLayoutSize, subitem: NSCollectionLayoutItem, count: Int) -> Self
```

## Discussion

When you set a value for the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCollectionLayoutGroup/interItemSpacing] property after using this initializer, the group keeps the same number of items and automatically resizes them to add the extra specified spacing between them.

## Creating a horizontal group

- **horizontal(layoutSize:subitems:)**: Creates a group of the specified size, containing an array of items arranged in a horizontal line.
